DOC.brief_summary: Study hypothesis The overall aim study compare two bowel preparation use prior colonoscopy procedure . The principal research question : 1 . Does use low residue diet increase patient concordance bowel preparation instruction ? 2 . Does use low residue diet decrease adequacy assessment mucosa ? 3 . Does use low residue diet increase willingness patient undertake repeat examination require disease followâˆ’up ? 4 . Does body weight affect perceive tolerability either group ?
DOC.brief_title: Improving Outcomes Patients Requiring Oral Bowel Preparation Colonoscopy
DOC.criteria: Patients attend Colonoscopy . Patients refer colonoscopy via General Practitioner . Individuals would fully understand trial purpose ( assessed cognisance scale require ) Previous episodes total partial small bowel obstruction Previous colonic surgery Known swallow disorder Pregnancy Extremes age ( Less 16 great 80 ) Small Intestine disorder Renal Insufficiency ( Serum Creatinine > 110 ) Congestive Heart failure Presence ascites Severe Colitis
